entry.notes: Imported from Times Microwave Systems catalog

source_text:
Times Microwave Systems LMR-1200
Model: LMR-1200
Type: cable
1.200" diameter flexible coaxial cable, PE jacket
Impedance: 50 ohms
Velocity: 88.0%
Attenuation at 50 MHz: 0.13 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 150 MHz: 0.23 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 220 MHz: 0.29 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 450 MHz: 0.42 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 900 MHz: 0.61 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1800 MHz: 0.9 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1900 MHz: 0.93 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 2400 MHz: 1.05 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 5800 MHz: 1.85 dB/100ft

expected_json.description: 1.200" diameter flexible coaxial cable, PE jacket
expected_json.notes: Largest LMR cable, very low loss but heavy and less flexible
